title: Kylie Jenner sets TikTok record with a billion views under #RiseandShine hashtag singing to daughter
text:
Kylie Jenner has set TikTok record with a billion views under the #RiseandShine hashtag, as people continue to click on it or associated content, days after the reality star sang a memorable lullaby for her daughter Stormi.

TikTok officals told TMZ Monday that the clip starring Jenner, 22, and her daughter (with rapper Travis Scott, 28) has set a number of metric milestones since its October 16 release.

The clip aimed to showcase Kylie walking through her luxe Kylie Cosmetics office, heading to pick up her daughter, who was resting in a crib in a quiet room.

Milestone: Kylie Jenner, 22, has set TikTok record with a billion views under the #RiseandShine hashtag, as people continue to click on it, or associated content, days after the reality star sang a lullaby for daughter Stormi

She carried a nice melody telling the toddler to 'rise and shine,' uncovering her singing talents.

The Los Angeles-born makeup mogul's #RiseandShine hashtag, TikTok told the outlet, was viewed 4 million in its first day, 70 million times in its second day and one billion times by Sunday.

The news came as a source told E! News Monday that Life of Kylie personality and the Houston rapper Scott 'are doing very well, to the point that 'everyone thinks they are [getting] back together or already are,' as 'it doesn't seem like much has changed' in the wake of their recent decision to back off on their two-year relationship.

'There are very positive vibes between' the Kylie Cosmetics entrepreneur and Astroworld artist, the source told the outlet. 'They love being together with Stormi and are happy doing that.'

Hidden talent: She carried a nice melody telling the toddler to 'rise and shine'

Viral: TikTok said the was viewed 4 million in its first day, 70 million times in its second day and one billion times by Sunday

Toddler: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott welcomed Stormi February 1, 2018

Sunny day: Kylie acknowledged the viral clip with a funny photoshopped pic

The social media influencer and Travis are 'looking forward to' Halloween this year and taking their toddler trick or treating, the source said.

'They will do something together as a family,' the insider told the outlet 'All the littlest cousins will be together at some point in their costumes.

'They will have candy at home and a little party. They also may go to a few houses in their community too.'
description: The clip aimed to showcase Kylie walking through her luxe Kylie Cosmetics office, heading to pick up her daughter, who was resting in a crib in a quiet room.
